content.description: A researcher claims that a certain herbicide suppresses plant growth by inhibiting chloroplast function. To test the claim, the researcher treats isolated chloroplasts with increasing concentrations of the herbicide. The data from the experiment are presented in Table 1.
content.question: Table 1. The effect of an herbicide on the function of isolated chloroplasts Herbicide Concentration <math alttext="in micrograms per liter" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtext>μg</mtext><mo>/</mo><mtext>L</mtext><mo>)</mo></mrow></math> <math alttext="p H" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>pH</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> Difference across Thylakoid Membrane <math alttext="A T P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>ATP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> Production <math alttext="0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>0</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="3.5" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3.5</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> Very high <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>2</mtext><mtext></mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="2.5" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2.5</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> Moderate <math alttext="8" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>8</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="0.5" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0.5</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> Very low <math alttext="32" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>32</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> Very low Which of the following statements best clarifies how the data support the researcher’s claim?

choices.label: The thylakoid membrane is more permeable to carbon dioxide than to polar molecules.
<math alttext="A T P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>ATP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> synthase activity depends on a proton gradient across the thylakoid membrane.
Some enzymes embedded in the thylakoid membrane catalyze the hydrolysis of <math alttext="A T P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>ATP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>.
Carbon fixation in the Calvin-Benson cycle takes place in the stroma of chloroplasts.

content.answer: <math alttext="A T P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>ATP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> synthase activity depends on a proton gradient across the thylakoid membrane.

skill.text: 6.B: Support a claim with evidence from biological principles, concepts, processes, and data.
